Description: Geographic region ID with the first 2 digits being the state Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) code and the last 3 digits the county FIPS code
The date that the sample was collected
PFHxS concentration in the sample measured in parts per trillion (ppt or ng/L)
PFNA concentration in the sample measured in parts per trillion (ppt or ng/L)
HFPO-DA concentration in the sample measured in parts per trillion (ppt or ng/L)
PFBS concentration in the sample measured in parts per trillion (ppt or ng/L)
